title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
description: A great film - high quality cinema (in all seriousness)

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Superbad
description: High-school seniors Seth (Jonah Hill) and Evan (Michael Cera) have high hopes for a graduation party

title: Bridesmaids
description: Annie (Kristen Wiig) is a single woman whose own life is a mess, but when she learns that her lifelong best friend, Lillian (Maya Rudolph), is engaged, she has no choice but to serve as the maid of honor.

title: Airplane!
director: David Zucker, Jim Abrahams, Jerry Zucker
description: This spoof comedy takes shots at the slew of disaster movies that were released in the 70s.

title: The Notebook
description: In 1940s South Carolina, mill worker Noah Calhoun (Ryan Gosling) and rich girl Allie (Rachel McAdams) are desperately in love.

title: Love Actually
description: Nine intertwined stories examine the complexities of the one emotion that connects us all: love

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: In 1987, Jordan Belfort (Leonardo DiCaprio) takes an entry-level job at a Wall Street brokerage firm

title: Forrest Gump
description: Slow-witted Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) has never thought of himself as disadvantaged, and thanks to his supportive mother (Sally Field), he leads anything but a restricted life

title: Fight Club
description: The First Rule of Fight Club: Don't Talk About Fight Club
